content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No permanent structures have been successfully established on the map. The agent made several attempts to deploy a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but each placement or crafting attempt failed. Although operations involving smelting in furnaces were executed (using a furnace at (5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at (-27.0, -60.0)), these units were retrieved from the map rather than newly constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities Usage Errors  
  – Avoid passing unsupported arguments such as “radius” or extra positional parameters to get_entities. Always confirm the API signature before making the call.

• Lab Placement Without Inventory  
  – Verify that the Lab item is present in the inventory prior to attempting placement to prevent placement failures.

• Iteration Over a NoneType Collection  
  – When retrieving entities (e.g. labs), check for a None return value and default to an empty list before iterating.

• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages  
  – Ensure that all sub-ingredients and intermediate production steps (iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable) are available or producible through proper crafting or smelting facilities before attempting to craft a Lab.
